Images.Name: Arrangement 1
Images.Description: Wooden spoons, fork and whisk  from Emmaus, Slussen. Glass bowl from Stadsmission, Hornsgatan. Cellophane from Material Art Supplies store Kungsgatan. Studio mirror, backdrop and tressel table all conveniently at hand.

Images.Name: Arrangement 2
Images.Description: Wooden spoons, fork and whisk  from Emmaus, Slussen. Glass bowl from Stadsmission, Hornsgatan. Cellophane from Material Art Supplies store Kungsgatan. Studio mirror, backdrop and tressel table all conveniently at hand.

Images.Name: Arrangement 3
Images.Description: Golden teaspoons from Myrorna Ropsten. Faceted glass form Emmaus Hornsgatan. Inverted cake mould from Emmaus Hornsgatan. Gold plate from Stadsmission, Hornsgatan. Cellophane from Material Art Supplies store Kungsgatan. Studio mirror, backdrop and tressel table all conveniently at hand.

Images.Name: Arrangement 4
Images.Description: Engraved forks with bone handle from Emmaus, Slussen. Used sill jar. Silver octagonal plate from Myrorna Hornsgatan. Gold plate from Stadsmission, Hornsgatan. Cellophane from Material Art Supplies store Kungsgatan. Studio mirror, backdrop and tressel table all conveniently at hand.
